name: Adam James
coverLetter:
I've been in the Cannibus Industry for 5 years. I started out trimming every season and moved up to wholesale distribution. I didn't intend on trimming this year, however I just couldn't see myself sitting out. It's part of who I am!

I am heading to Arcata at the date of this submission. I will have a tent and sleeping bag. I'm very flexible with accommodations. If I'm paid daily I do not mind feeding myself.

I can clear two lbs of outdoor a day. I am used to committing to 14-16 hour days with limited breaks. I take trimming very seriously and work well with other like minded workers.
